PerkXMLStruct.name: Perk Tree
PerkXMLStruct.description:
This perk tree grants you access to upgrades to your towers, abilities, and rewards. Once you spend a perk point, it unlocks the upgrade universally and unlocks the path to more upgrades further up the perk tree.
Choose wisely, as you can't reset these points!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Heated Shot I
PerkXMLStruct.description: By heating their projectiles to 500 degrees Celcius, your Gun Towers gain +1 damage to all creeps!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Alien Bankers I
PerkXMLStruct.description: The Empire recruits a new legion of bankers from a far off planet, their ingenious betting system increases your credit reward by 1 credit per kill!

PerkXMLStruct.name: High Frequency Occillators
PerkXMLStruct.description: Scientists discover that by increasing the speed of the occilators inside your Beam Towers, it increases the damage per second by 5! Well Done, Science!

PerkXMLStruct.name: G-Force Compensators
PerkXMLStruct.description: The rocketry teams report success on increasing the flight speed of your ICBM's. This new research increases rocket speed and thereby decreasing the flight time by 0.5 seconds!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Heated Shot II
PerkXMLStruct.description: A new copper alloy with a higher melting point allows each round to be heated to a much higher temperature! Hot Hot Hot! +2 damage.

PerkXMLStruct.name: Crackling Lasers I
PerkXMLStruct.description: By increasing the power of Beam Towers, they do more damage! Who would have known? 10 tera volts = +10 damage per second!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Zero-friction Rollers
PerkXMLStruct.description: Gun Towers have the disadvantage of turning very slowly. By using better bearings on the base, this perk allows them to aquire new targets much faster!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Alien Bankers II
PerkXMLStruct.description: The Neamodian Banking Clan increase the bounty on alien creeps. You gain even more reward per kill! +3 credits per kill!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Compressed Warhead
PerkXMLStruct.description: By compressing more explosive into the payload, we get a bigger explosion. Hopefull. At least our simulations say so! +50 damage.

PerkXMLStruct.name: Crackling Lasers II
PerkXMLStruct.description: Two cables are better than one! Increased electrical power increases beam displacement and target temperature. This perk adds 10 damage per second!

PerkXMLStruct.name: Heated Shot III
PerkXMLStruct.description: This technology adds a magnesium base to your rounds. Along with leaving a firey trail, these cause much more damage and can burn, or start fires.

PerkXMLStruct.name: Sattelite Targetting
PerkXMLStruct.description: The space base launches a new targetting sattelite for ICBM's. Now silo's launch missiles twice as often.

PerkXMLStruct.name: Crackling Lasers III
PerkXMLStruct.description: “Electricity is really just organized lighting” ― George Carlin
